projects.name: Made With Unity: The Outsiders
projects.description: A website featuring an upcoming game made with the Unity engine. Launched just in time for the Unite 2016 event in Los Angeles.

projects.name: Subaru – Symmetry
projects.description: An interactive website for car maker, Subaru. Built with a custom scene manager in Javascript and the browser’s native video API — including a user timing game featuring animated SVG’s!

projects.name: Foundry Salon
projects.description: A business website for a hair salon based in Kailua. Utilizes external API’s for company data, including pulling in its Instagram feed and showing its location on Google Maps.

projects.name: JJ Dolan’s
projects.description: A website for a compelling pizza kitchen — featuring a progressively loaded, mobile-friendly canvas drawing application at the top of the page. It went on to win a AAF Pele Gold in 2016.

projects.name: Luma
projects.description: A website for a smart wifi device’s anticipated launch. It was built promptly in time for it to be sold on Amazon and across the nation.

projects.name: Seekout
projects.description: A website to help organize and promote safe, fun events for the LGBTQ community. It’s great to be a part of such a well thought out and good intentioned web application.

projects.name: Surf Status
projects.description: A surf report void of the typical clutter — engineered using MongoDB, Express, and Node.js (known in some circles as the MEN stack). Read more on how it’s built.

projects.name: Hallowbaloo
projects.description: A website for the largest Halloween event in Honolulu. It innovated in terms of SVG animation, with a feature earning positive feedback on Codepen.

projects.name: Blake Entertainment
projects.description: A website for a premier event planner in Honolulu. We made sure to emphasize the breadth of their events — from red carpets to poke bars.
